title: Content Creation
info: Articles, blogs, how-to pieces, guides, whatever you need. On any topic and specialising in travel.

title: Social Media
info: Helping you find your voice on social media to stand out from the crowd, stay relevant and talked about.

title: Press and Print
info: Engaging copy that people want to read, with catchy headlines.

title: Advertising Content
info: Well-researched content written in your publication’s tone of voice, giving you advertising content that doesn’t feel like an advert at all.

title: Advertising Ideas
info: Big ideas for how to increase your reach. Fresh ways to sell your products and concepts.

title: Video scripts
info: Promotional video, educational or practical, I’ll write the words to accompany your visual vision.

title: Leaflets and Brochures
info: Leaflets that gives your message clearly. Brochures that people read and remember.

title: Names, Taglines and Slogans
info: Catchy ways I’ll help you be the talk of the town (or your niche anyway).

title: Direct Response
info: Newsletters, direct mail, and email. Giving you words that convert to action.

title: Press Releases
info: If you want to get your company’s news some attention, I’ll get your latest product, new team member or event noticed, I can help you with that.

title: Web Copy
info: Copywriting and SEO services. Amp up the power of your website and brand.

title: Brand Development
info: Helping craft your brand’s story and finding your tone of voice.

title: Proofreading
info: I can check any important document, essay, publication, webpage, website, that you’ve written (including all types above) for grammar, spelling, punctuation, structure and facts. I can proofread from Word using Track Changes, PDFs using Adobe Reader or on paper.

title: Copy Editing
info: I can edit any type of document or article you’ve written (including all pre-mentioned ones) to proofreading standard plus suggesting any content or structural changes needed, rewriting parts where needed.

title: Web Development
info: If you need a website with your words – whether that be an e-commerce site, portfolio site, blog, anything you need – I work closely with web developer Nick Worrall, who I highly recommend, and we can offer you a package deal.
